exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat c, h, l : pos n Hch : c <> h Hcl : c <> l Hhl : h <> l p, q : nat decoder_error := PUSH c Zero :: POP c q q :: nil : list (bsm_instr n) s, i : nat lt : list (list bool * list bool) Unable to unify "(fix length_decoder lt : nat := match lt with | nil => 2 | (th, tl) :: lt0 => 3 + length th + length tl + length_decoder lt0 end) lt" with "length (decoder s i lt)".
